descriptionHtml:
Log:

SUMMONS:

Tred -
(Death Essence summons a Bone Warrior for 18 seconds.)

Minimum Skill Level: 25
Spell Cost: 65
Spell Charge: 3 Seconds
Duration: 18 seconds
Casting Perk: ConjurationNovice00
Equip Type: Both Hand

Vetra -
(Death Essence summons a Bone Mage for 1 day.)

Minimum Skill Level: 50
Spell Cost: 200
Spell Charge: 3 Seconds
Duration: 18 seconds
Casting Perk: ConjurationAdept 50
Equip Type: Both Hand

Felid -
(Death Essence summons a Bone Archer until killed.)

Minimum Skill Level: 75
Spell Cost: 200
Spell Charge: 3 Seconds
Duration: 18 seconds
Casting Perk: ConjurationNovice00
Equip Type: Both Hand


REANIMATIONS:

Dert -
(Reanimate a level 11 or lower dead body for 2 minutes, fortifies its health by 200 points for 2 minutes.)

Minimum Skill Level: 25
Spell Cost: 65
Spell Charge: 3 Seconds
Duration: 120 seconds
Casting Perk: ConjurationNovice00
Equip Type: Both Hand

Wyrn Rag -
(Reanimate a level 100 or lower dead body, fortifies its health by 600 points until killed.)

Minimum Skill Level: 25
Spell Cost: 600
Spell Charge: 6 Seconds
Duration: Indefinite
Casting Perk: ConjurationExpert75
Equip Type: Both Hand

CONJURES:

Bone Spike -
(Conjures Bone staff, sheathe to dispel.) (Reanimates target for 120 seconds, casts Death Cloak around them)

Minimum Skill Level: 25
Spell Cost: 200
Spell Charge: 3 Seconds
Duration: 22 seconds
Casting Perk: ConjurationNovice00
Equip Type: Either Hand

Tomb Bone -
(Conjures a Bone Axe, sheathe to dispel.) (Reanimates dead body on contact)

Minimum Skill Level: 25
Spell Cost: 200
Spell Charge: 3 Seconds
Duration: 22 seconds
Casting Perk: ConjurationApprentice25
Equip Type: Either Hand

Offense:

Existence Beta -
(Casts Death Essence on to target that absorbs 40 points of health from target.)

Minimum Skill Level: 0
Spell Cost: 111
Spell Charge: 2 Seconds
Duration: n/a
Casting Perk: n/a
Equip Type: Both Hand

Molecular Waste -
(Curses target with Death Essence draining 2.5 points of health per second for 20 seconds.)

Minimum Skill Level: 0
Spell Cost: 111
Spell Charge: 2 Seconds
Duration: 20 Seconds
Casting Perk: n/a
Equip Type: Either Hand


Defense:

Death Cloak -
(Cloak target in Death Essence damaging nearby opponents of health and half stamina damage.)

Minimum Skill Level: 25
Spell Cost: 200
Spell Charge: 3 Seconds
Duration: 22 Seconds
Casting Perk: ConjurationApprentice25
Equip Type: Either Hand

Chemical Traits -
( Death Essence shrouded around me damages nearby enemies within melee range by 10 points to health per second and half of that to stamina, Conjures Bone Spike, increases armor rating by 100 points)

Minimum Skill Level: 0
Spell Cost: 400
Spell Charge: 3 Seconds
Duration: 60 seconds
Casting Perk: ConjurationExpert75
Equip Type: Both Hand


Recomended/Required Mods:
Gravelords- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - dark souls - sithis) by Mihail Romanov
Black Mage Armor By lRekol
author: Yyzi
